item.title: Dynamic T-1 Offers Business Savings
item.description: Your business is expanding, and you need more phone lines. Adding individual lines works, but a more efficient and budget-friendly option exists: Dynamic T-1. Dynamic T-1 is a flexible service that adjusts to your needs. But how? Let’s start with traditional T-1, a digital service offering up to 24 phone lines or 1.5 Mbps internet speed on a single line using two copper wires. It’s widely available and can even connect two business locations directly.
